profileJS_createKeyFromPrivateKeyAction_: Using same password as private key is a very bad idea
profileJS_createKeyFromMnemonicAction_64:
Passwords can't be longer than 64 bytes, due to a bug in scrypt-js
In case you want a stronger password, consider using 
<Create Account> instead of <Create Mnemonic Account>
